issue.message: When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry
Use "`end`" instead of "`right`" to ensure correct behavior in right-to-left locales
Consider adding `android:paddingStart="20dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts

Consider adding `android:layout_marginStart="12dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
